txt.en: The Huorn, Rottenheart, is an uncontrollable force of nature, and a danger to all that dwell within Balewood.
You have defeated Rottenheart and granted a small degree of peace to Balewood.
Rottenheart can be found in south-western Balewood amidst a glade of barren trees.
The Huorn, Rottenheart, is an unruly force in Balewood beyond Leaflock's control.
You have stumbled upon the roaming Huorn, Rottenheart.
